overview: To offer: to present as an act of worship or devotion.  If couples want to last, they have to preserve the love and passion they felt at the beginning. To do so, these young couples have decided that in order to take full advantage of their time together, they had to share their love with other parnters. Through sensual and perverse games, men share their wives with others. The latter didn't expect to enjoy it so much.  On all fours, entirely submitted to her husband's desires, Alexa is waiting, just dressed in stockings and high heels, for her husband's guest to come and take her. So excited to see his wife like this, Joel will join them to take full advantage of the situation.
tagline: He has his wife fucked by others.
title: Luxure: I Offer My Wife to Others
